author: R Rajaram
text:
Ahead of the Mahamaham festival, two top officers of the Railway Protection Force (RPF) will inspect the Kumbakonam railway station in connection with security arrangements to be made for the event.

The Inspector General–cum–Chief Security Commissioner, RPF, Southern Railway, S.C. Parhi, and the Inspector General–cum–Chief Security Commissioner, RPF, Central Railway, A.K. Singh, will inspect Kumbakonam station on Thursday morning.

The two senior officers will arrive at Tiruchi by Rockfort Express on Thursday morning and leave by road to Kumbakonam where they will inspect the station and discuss regarding the security measures to be taken there, railway sources said.
title: Two IGs visiting today
